subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Philipp Lahm, a 26-year-old defender, has become Germany’s captain in the absence of the injured Michael Ballack and has his team in the World Cup semifinals.
snippet: Philipp Lahm, a 26-year-old defender, has become Germany’s captain in the absence of the injured Michael Ballack and has his team in the World Cup semifinals.
